actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 3 of title 38, United States Code, in order to provide additional benefits to employees of the Veterans' Administration serving at offices in the Republic of the Philippines, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals the authority of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish an office in Europe, and permits him to pay specified travel, subsistence, and sale and purchase of residence expenses of employees of the Veterans' Administration serving at its offices in the Republic of the Philippines.

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 3 of title 38, United States Code, in order to provide additional benefits to employees of the Veterans' Administration serving at offices in the Republic of the Philippines, and for other purposes.
